title: Image
description:
Image can be one of the following:

* Metadata Image - A reference to an image in metadata `Images` folder that has a `.png`, `.jpg`, `.jpeg`, `.svg` or `.pdf` extension.

* Resource Image - A reference to an image resource built-in to the client application `res://some-image`.

 * HTTPS Image - An HTTPS URL pointing to an image. HTTP is not supported

 * SAP Icon - A reference to SAP font icon using sap-icon:// namespace e.g. `sap-icon://add`. This namespace is specific for SAP Icons, version OpenUI5 1.129.0.

* Font Icon - A unicode based font icon e.g. font://&#{unicode} namespace e.g. `font://&#xe05b`. By default MDK only supports SAP Icons. To use 3rd party font icon, add the font file (*.ttf) to fonts folder inside mdkproject and apply style class to the image with font-family property pointing to the 3rd party font.
